医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Cellular Origins 收购 Actia Platform IP 以增强自动化细胞疗法制造Cellular Origins 是一家 TTP 公司，专注于实现细胞和基因疗法 (CGT) 的可扩展、经济高效且高效的制造，今天宣布收购由 Geoff Hodge 开发的 ACTIA（自体细胞治疗工业自动化）平台 IP，同时美国SOTIO Biotech首席执行官。 ACTIA 平台补充了 Cellular Origins 的现有方法，并将加速和扩大研发工作，以进一步开发该公司用于自动化细胞治疗制造的机器人解决方案 Constellation™。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Cellular-Origins-acquires-Actia-Platform-IP-to-enhance-automated-cell-therapy-manufacturing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Cellular-Origins-acquires-Actia-Platform-IP-to-enhance-automated-cell-therapy-manufacturing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5ffd7724-8ea3-4734-a7e1-c69e6179b72d Tue, 02 Jul 2024 06:06:00 -0400 Cellular Origins acquires Actia Platform IP to enhance automated cell therapy manufacturing
Optibrium 展示了复杂农用化学品开发中的加速先导化合物优化Optibrium 是一家领先的分子设计软件和人工智能解决方案开发商，今天宣布在《计算机辅助分子设计杂志》上发表了一项同行评审研究，“从 UK-2A 到氟啶吡沙胺：主动学习识别大环天然化合物的模拟物”产品' https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Optibrium-demonstrates-accelerated-lead-optimization-in-complex-agrochemical-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Optibrium-demonstrates-accelerated-lead-optimization-in-complex-agrochemical-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4e064352-1dea-4951-b393-b30a0a10b72f Tue, 02 Jul 2024 06:03:00 -0400 Optibrium demonstrates accelerated lead optimization in complex agrochemical development
研究表明，更接近绿色和蓝色空间可减少冠状动脉钙化社会经济地位和种族对城市绿色和蓝色区域的亲近程度与心血管健康之间联系的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Study-shows-reduced-coronary-artery-calcification-with-closer-access-to-green-and-blue-spaces.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Study-shows-reduced-coronary-artery-calcification-with-closer-access-to-green-and-blue-spaces.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b484d30b-4228-43f7-834a-cf1c74ddcf5b Tue, 02 Jul 2024 04:54:00 -0400 Study shows reduced coronary artery calcification with closer access to green and blue spaces
水果味电子烟和夜间干咳——有什么关系？研究人员检查了接触电子烟口味与夜间干咳之间的纵向关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Fruit-flavored-vapes-and-a-nighttime-dry-cough-whats-the-connection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Fruit-flavored-vapes-and-a-nighttime-dry-cough-whats-the-connection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6d5756ab-828d-4108-bc68-bfb17507d934 Tue, 02 Jul 2024 04:52:00 -0400 Fruit flavored vapes and a nighttime dry cough - what's the connection?
青少年认知功能低下与早期中风风险较高相关青少年认知表现与成年期中风之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Low-cognitive-function-in-teens-correlates-with-higher-early-中风-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Low-cognitive-function-in-teens-correlates-with-higher-early-中风-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a6aa6f90-ee6b-4b62-a88a-40569b08749b Tue, 02 Jul 2024 04:12:00 -0400 Low cognitive function in teens correlates with higher early stroke risk
阿拉斯加北极熊体内检测到禽流感病毒研究人员报告称，阿拉斯加一只自由放养的幼年北极熊自然感染了高致病性甲型禽流感 (H5N1) 病毒，这凸显了野生动物健康监测在检测新出现病原体方面的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Bird-flu-virus-Detected-in-Alaskan-tropic-bear.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Bird-flu-virus-Detected-in-Alaskan-tropic-bear.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1230c002-e921-4370-9197-0c1d2cad393f Tue, 02 Jul 2024 01:42:00 -0400 Bird flu virus detected in Alaskan polar bear
是什么促使 Z 世代接受植物性饮食？一项针对希腊、印度和英国 Z 世代大学生的研究表明，态度、健康饮食知识、膳食准备参与和感知障碍显着影响他们采用植物性饮食的意愿，凸显了推广可持续食品的机遇和挑战选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/What-drives-Gen-Z-to-embrace-plant-based-diets.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/What-drives-Gen-Z-to-embrace-plant-based-diets.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=48ef6b65-716d-4f29-9b33-846eead3d81d Tue, 02 Jul 2024 01:17:00 -0400 What drives Gen Z to embrace plant-based diets?
健康生活是最好的药物：研究将健康习惯与降低高血压患者死亡率联系起来研究人员发现，由 Life's Essential 8 (LE8) 定义的较高心血管健康评分与高血压患者较低的死亡风险相关。全面改变生活方式可以使高血压患者受益匪浅。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Living-well-is-the-best-medicine-Study-links-healthy-habits-to-lower-mortality-in-hypertential-individuals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Living-well-is-the-best-medicine-Study-links-healthy-habits-to-lower-mortality-in-hypertential-individuals.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ce7eb825-d64e-4a8f-af22-64fe6a3d4995 Tue, 02 Jul 2024 01:01:00 -0400 Living well is the best medicine: Study links healthy habits to lower mortality in hypertensive individuals
没有一个器官是一座孤岛：基因研究显示独特但相互关联的衰老标记研究人员使用英国生物银行的大型数据集分析了九个器官系统中生物年龄差距的遗传基础，揭示了器官特异性但相互关联的遗传结构。他们的发现可能有助于了解复杂的疾病和开发整体治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/No-organ-is-an-island-Genetic-study-shows-unique-but-interconnected-aging-markers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/No-organ-is-an-island-Genetic-study-shows-unique-but-interconnected-aging-markers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ee593cb-6218-4d28-8dda-57b4e3e3fefd Tue, 02 Jul 2024 00:40:00 -0400 No organ is an island: Genetic study shows unique but interconnected aging markers
实施以患者为中心的姑息治疗可能有助于改善心脏病患者的生活质量根据美国《心血管疾病姑息药物治疗》的一项新科学声明，实施以患者为中心的姑息治疗，包括根据需要开药、调整或停止用药，可能有助于控制心脏病患者的症状并改善生活质量。心脏协会，今天发表在协会的期刊《循环：心血管质量和结果》上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Implementing-eptic-centered-palliative-care-may-help-improve-quality-of-life-for-people-with-heart-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Implementing- Patient-centered-palliative-care-may-help-improve-quality-of-life-for-people-with-heart-disease.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fb661d25-b45e-4d91-99ef-54546a539d54 Mon, 01 Jul 2024 23:43:00 -0400 Implementing patient-centered palliative care may help improve quality of life for people with heart disease
